div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per thomam fif et Andream culan' ballivos primo die
arij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjto

the quhilk day the aldirman and balyeis for waknes of the court has continevit the action
betuix William blindsel and William moir' anent the waring of certan hidis quhile
friday cum viij dais

The samyn day the aldirman and balyeis has assignit mononday cum xv dais to
thome of mar' to ansuer tile henry hourum and tile a decret producit be him befor
tham deliuerit be James of leslie Dauid menyes and alexander rede And' thai haue distrenit
the copy of the saide decret to the saide thomas one his expensis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem per thomam fif et Andream culan ballivos
quinto die februarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxvjto

The quhilk day alexander tailyour tuk to preif and mak gude that Richerd hile the
fadir has dischargit him of his hous' maile fra mertimes to Witsonday this day
xv dais or within the samyn terme the said' Richerd being' warnit tharto obefor And' falying
of his preif to pay the saide maile

the samyn day Androu andirson producit and schew in jugement ane chartir vndir
his fadir Seile and the Sele of thome of fif bailye of the gift donacion and posse
ssione of thar landis vndir writin gevin to him be his said' fadir that is to say of a land
liand' in the chaker raw betuix the lande of alexander menyeis one the west part And'
the land of Alexander mar of the southtis And' the kingis gate one the est and northt partis
And of a land liand one the tothir side of the gate betuix the land of Dauy spens one
the est part And' the land of Jhone of culan one the west part And' of ane annuell
rent of four' merkis of annuell of the said Dauy spensis land and of ane annuell rent
of tene s' of Jhone huchonsonnis land liand one the northt part of the land of vmquhile
alexander honysone callit nevport And thareftir the aldirman maid Inhibicion to the
bailyeis that thai suld gif nay possessione of the samyn to nay personis because
the saide Androw was in possession' of the said landis annuel Rentis

The samyn day Alexander menyeis aldirman James leslie Robert blindsel Jhon'
Wornet thome of fiff amicabile compositoris chosin betuix mastir Jhon' badenaghe'
one that vthir ane part And' forsicht movat his gude modir one that vthir part
anent the debatis movit betuix tham concerning the coniunctfeftment clamit be the
said forsicht of ane tenment liand' in the castalgat betuix the landis of
thomas fif one the west partis And' the land of vmquhil the vicar'
of Inuerugy one the est partis cla the said partiis being' oblist be the fathtis
of thar bodiis in Jugement to stand' at thar deliuerance has deliuerit and ordanit
that the said' mastir Jhon' sal jois' and breuk the haile forland of the said
tenment to the mydile yet except' the pethous' betuix the tua latheris
And' the butht nerrast thome of fiffis land' And' the thrid part of the
yard nerrast the southt the said mastir Jhone payand' al annuell
pertening to the hail tenment And' the said' forsicht sal jois' and bruk the
haile inland' fra the said mydile yet with hal kethe chamer and the tua partis
of the yard nerrast the northt to giddir with the said' butht and pethous'
with thar pertinence befor excepit with fre vsche and entre at the foryet and bakyet
to batht the said' partiis And' this appunctment to Indur' for al the dais
of thar lywez but preiudice to hir' Junctfeftment and to the said' mastir Jhonnis
heretage befor Jhone steuinson' and sere Robert leis notar

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod magister Johannes badenaghe' est legittimus
et propinquior heres quondam patricij badenaghe' patris suj

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per alexandrum de camera thomam prat et Andream culan
ballivos xijo februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjo

Quo die Alexander Iruyne de Drvm deuenit plegius legalis quod cristinus prat et Alexander
prat et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro Willelmo sandeson aliter quam per viam Juris et pro parte
sua et Idem Willelmus obligatur se fide media ad conseruandum dictum dominum de Drum indempnem
huiusmodi fidemissione per ostenstionem ostensionem manus

the samyn day William sandeson panton' tuk to preif this day xv dais
that he had deliuerit to cristy prat and Sandy prat the oxe that was opte
nit apone Will of auchneywe

the samyne day the belman at the commavnd of the aldirman and ballieis passit throw
the haile towne and warnit ande w chargit ale and sundry merchand mene and nichtboris
to cum to the tolbutht the samyn day befor novne to se gif thai or ony of tham wald
tak apon' tham to be bundin tile our Souerane lorde the kinge and his factoris in xv
lastis of salmond' or ony part of it in siclikuys' as Alexander menyes aldirman alexander chamer
of murchil James leslie Jhone Colison thome prat and Androw murray ar bundin be
thar obligacion And at the nichtbouris being' gathtreit that tyme it was inque
rit be the said aldirman In the name of the said sex personis And' be alexander chamer seriand'
gif ony of thame wald be bundin' for the said xv lastis of Salmond' or ony part
of tham ane tua thre or four lastis And to haue pament tharfor of the taxt siluere
and grissome siluer siclikuys' as the saide sex personis ar pait

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per thomam prat ballivum xix die mensis februarij
anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo Sexto et Alexandrum de camera ballivum

the samyne day alexander tailyour come dettour to Richerd hill for xij s' for his
hous' maile to be pait at the next Witsonday

the samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Jhone Colison forspekar
that the decret maide betuix thome of mar and henry hourum is of waile
And' the ballieis has chargit the said' thomas of mar' to content and pay the saide
henry the some contenit in the saide decret within terme of law eftir the tenor of
the samyn decret

The samyn day Mariory leche cristiane leche and margaret leche douchteris to vmquhile
gilbert leche comperit befor the aldirman and balyeis and askit at tham to be kend' to the land
of vmquhil the saide gilbert as nerrast and lauchfull ayris to thar said' fadir And to
fynd' caucion and souerte gif thar brothir be one lywe and happynnis to cum hame
eftiruart to deliuer him the saide lande eftir the consuetude of the burghe' And the
aldirman and baillieis has continevit the saide actione quhile the law day eftir
pasche And' thai protestit the saide continuacion suld turne thame to nay preiudice
nor thar ayris

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxio die februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjo
per thomam fif et Andream Culane balliuos

the quhilk day alexander chamer of murchile schew to the aldirman and ballieis how
he hede ane half nethis' fischingis of the Raik in assedacion of the tone and askit
nichtbuyrschipe to streik with him And gif ony man had ony thing to say to
his said half nethis fisching he offerit him redy to vndirly the aldirman and consal
protestand' that the aldirman and consaile suld nocht be displesit that he strekit ane haile
neth' gif he gate nay nichtbourschipe

Item the saide Alexander constitut and ordanit Alexander chamer of methtlik his sone and Dauid
matheson coniunctlie and seueralie his procuratoris to defend' his halff nethis fischingis
of the Raik And' in ale vthir materis concerning him in vberiore forma procuratorij
promittens de Rato et grato

the samyne day Jhone of Knollis grantit be his avne toung grantit that
vmquhile Jhone andirson burges of Abirdene had certane annuellis of him in wede
sett

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Johannis andirson
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchil Robertus blinsell Alexander red Dauid matheson Andreas
Murray senior Walterus auchneywe Willelmus tulidef Dauid prat Richardus
hill pater / Andreas ancroft Dauid spens' henricus horvm Symon gardyn
Ranaldus tailyour' et Jacobus crake qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes
andirson burgensis dicti burgi pater Johannis Jhonsone latoris presencium obiit
vltimo vestitus et saisitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castri inter terram quondam
Alexandri honysone ex orientali ex vna et terram Andree andirson ex occidentali
partibus ex altera et communem viam regiam versus austrum et terram Johannis huchonson versus boreum
Soluen' annuatim de eadem vnum annuum redditum quinque s' et iiijor d' capellano
altaris beate marie virginis ac alium annuum Redditum quatuor marcarum prefati Andree
andirson' Et quod dictus Johannes Jhonsone est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti
quondam Johannis patris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis et quod dicta
terra cum pertinenciis walet nunc per annum iij li' et tantum valuit tempore pacis
et quod tenetur de domino nostro Rege in Capite per seruicium burgale et nunc
existit in manibus domini nostri Regis legittime per se ipsum per mortem dicti patris
suj per duos menses aut eo circa in defectu heredis Jus suum minime per se
conuent' datum et clausum sub sigillo thome fyff vnius balliuorum predictorum
et sigillo quorundam qui huic inquisicionem Intererant faciende anno die
mense et loco suprascriptis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem per thomam fif et Andream culane ballivos
xxijo die februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvio

the samyne day it was fundin that William moir' has falyeit in his preif
and document that he tuk to bring within yer and day anent the selling and waring of
half ane last of hidis pertening' to William blinsell eftir the tenor of the act maid
obefor deliuerit be ane suorne assise Ande sal content and pay the said William blinsell
the waring of the samyn eftir the tenor' of his paper maide tharapon' within terme
of law

In the court of Abirdene haldin be Androw cullane alexander chamer and thomas prat thre of the
balyeis of the samyn the xvisic; recte 'xxvi?'. day of februar the yer of god et cetera lxxxvi yeris

the samyne day it was previt sufficiently that William of pantone sandesone
hade deliuerit the oxe to Cryste prat that was optenit apon William of
auchneyf obefor and the saide William and William quyt of the saide cristis clam
And' the saide Williame of pantone protestit for his costis expensis and skathtis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per thomam fif et Andream Culan duos balliuorum quinto
die marcij Anno Domini et cetera Octuagesimo sexto

quo die Jacobus meldrum conuictus per assisam
pro perturbio Andree aldene et ad emendandum ut Jura volunt predicto Andree

The samyne day it was ordanit and statut be the aldirman ballieis and consale
that gif James meldrum commitis ony strubulance within the tone in tyme to cum
apone ony persone that he sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes' werk vnforgevyn
And to remane within the tolbutht quhil he pay the said xl s'

the ix day of marche forsaid William blinsell comperit befor the aldirman and balyeis
and shew how he hade demi nethis fischingis of the mydchingill in tak of the tone
ande askit marouschipe to streik with him of ony person that was in the asseda
cion' of the tone And' protestit gif he makis ony costis in falt of marouschip
that nane haffand' Richt tharto haue enteres' tharwith quhil he be pait of the
samyn costis

The samyn day the aldirman offerit him to fynd' marouschip to streik
with the saide Williame apon the saide wattir

In the court haldin be thomas Fyff and Androu Culan tua of the balyeis
et cetera the xij day of marche the yer of god jM iiijC lxxxvj yeris

the
quhilk day Morice byssat and Duncan straloche tua seriandis preuyt sufficientlie
that thai at the commavnd of the aldirman balyeis and consal present for the tyme passit
to William moris hous' eldar and thar' warnit him to comper and chargit him diuers' tymes
befor the aldirman and ballieis this day for the pament of the waring of demi last
of hidis optenit be William blinsell apon him the quhilk William moir' comperit nocht

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per thomam fiff et Andream Culan duos balliuorum
eiusdem xiijo die marcij anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo sexto

the samyn day the aldirman and Consale present for the tyme chesit Jhone of Knollis and ordanit
him be suorne to syt apone sere Jhone of rudirfurdis compt' in absence of Dauid menyeis

the samyn day the aldirman and ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to mastir
Richerd of crafurde to ansuer to a borche strekit apon' him be William
portar for the arresting' of x li' g'

The xiiij day of marche forsaide moris byssat and Duncan straloche tua officaris
preuyt sufficientlie that thai passit at the commavnd of the aldirman and ballieis
and warnit and chargit William moir' eldar at his avne hous' to comper befor
tham for the pament of the saide demi lastis of hidis waring' optenit apon'
him be William blinsell becaus' he coud' nocht be comprehendit personaly
quhilk comperit nocht And' thareftir the aldirman and ballieis chargit the saide
officaris to warne the saide William to comper befor tham one friday that next
cumis as day of peremptouris for the pament of the saide demi last hidis waring'

the xvj day of marche forsaide William moir' eldar has dravyne his lande and his
gude be his hande to thomas fyff ane of the balyeis to entir in the tolbutht
befor the aldirman and balyeis one the next monunday for the said demi last hidis
waring' and to ansuer to thame tharapon'

The saide day In presens of thomas fif and Androu Culane tua ballieis James
leslie alexander rede Williame blinsell Androu Wentone and William of tulidef
ar chosin betuix Androu murray eldar one that ane part Ande Jhone low one that vthir
parte to be suorne as in ane assis' to ende and decide the debate betuix the
saide partiis of tua barrellis of Salmond' clamit be the saide Androw murray And'
the saide partiis ar oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis to vndirly thar' deliuerance
quhar' euere thai

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem per thomam fif et Andream Culane
duos balliuorum xixo die marcij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjo

the quhilk day thome of mar' grantit him pait of the fraucht of demi last of salmond
resauit fra Jhone paule quhilk was laide in the houlk

the samyn day Will moir' has dravin his lande and gude be his hande to thome
of fiff bailye to keipe him and the laif of the ballieis skathles anent the demi last of
hidis waring' optenit one him be William blinsell

div.head: assisa ad Inquisicionem Johannis Waus
div.p:
Jacobus leslie Robertus blinsell Johannes Colison Johannes Culan alexander rede Johannes Wormet
Andreas branche alexander traile Willelmus blinsell Richardus hill thomas mar Willelmus
Kintor et Willelmus tulidef quos Jurati dicunt quod quondam elena clat auia Johannis Waus
filij et heredis gilberti Waus burgensis dicti burgi obiit vltimo vestitus et saisitus ut de feodo
ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in le
gastraw inter terram quondam thome Culan ex australi ex vna et terram thome Waus ex
boriali partibus ex altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens extendens ad torrentem
molendinj superiorum versus occidens Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres
quondam dicte auie sue de dicta terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis et Soluen' annuatim
vnum annuum Redditum xx s' vicario et capellanis collegij Abirdonensis Et quod dicta terra valet
nunc per annum iij li' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur de domino nostro Rege
in capite per seruicium burgale et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis legittime per se ipsum
per mortem dicte auie sue per tres menses ac eo circa in defectu heredis Jus suum nominis
persequentis datum et clausum sub sigillo thome fyf vnius balliuorum predictorum et sigillo
quorundam quj huic Inquisicionem Intererant faciende anno die mense et loco suprascriptis

Eodem die Johannes Waus filius gilberti Waus tanquam heres et eo nomine elene clat
auie sue presentauit dictum breue Inquisicionis preposito et ballivis pro debita de seruicione eiusdem

In presens of alexander menyeis aldirman alexander chamer thomas prat and Androw culan
thre of the ballieis mariory leche cristiane leche and margaret leche douchteris to
vmquhile gilbert leche presentit a letter of our Souerane lordis vndir the signet
to kene tham to the landis and tenmentis of vmquhil the said gilbertis thar fadir et cetera xxjo
day of marche forsaid'

the samyn day the forsaid' thre cistiris maid constitut and ordanit alexander chamer
of murchil procurator for tham in the said thingis and al vthir thingis concerning tham
promittand' to hald ferme and stabill with al clausis necesser and oportone of procuratory
et cetera

The said day the forsaide thre cistiris fande thome of chavmer and mastir William
vmfray souerte to the said' bailyeis that the landis of vmquhill the forsaid' gilbert
thar fadir salbe furtht cumand to the sone and ayr of the saide gilbert and he be
one lywe

the xxij day of marche Walter auchneif maide constitut and ordanit James of leslie
and Androu murray eldar his procuratoris coniunctlie and seueralie to ask and resaue fiwe merkis
optenit and grantit apon' Dauid mar' And in al vthir actionis concerning him promittand'
to hald ferme and stabile et cetera

Vicesimo sexto die mensis marcij anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo septimo prepositus
balliui et consules consencierunt assedacionj facte per dominum matheum nicholaij capellanum
altaris Beati petri apostoli thome gardin' et agneti sponse sue de terra interiore cum
pertinenciis quondam vicarij de Inuerugy et eadem assedacionem confirmarunt pro terris in eadem'
contentis
Curia balliuorum tenta per thomam fiff quinto die mensis aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxxxvij

Quo die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Andreas glenmaluyn filius Johannis
glenmaluyn est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Johannis glenmaluyn fratris suj
defincti defuncti
